titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the University of Pittsburgh Archives Moving Images Collection, ca. 1928-2001 UA.Film.Video
titlestmt.author: Joshua Beloff.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-07-08 17:37:13 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: University of Pittsburgh Archives Moving Images Collection

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Pittsburgh. Archives Service Center

did.abstract: This is a collection of over 2,300 films and videos that mainly pertain to University of Pittsburgh athletics as well as University events and history. The collection (ca. 1928-ca. 2001) ranges from interviews and speeches by prominent University figures to sports highlight videos and University institutional messages. Types of media in this collection include VHS tapes, Betacam SP tapes, ¾ Inch U-matic tapes, and 16 millimeter film.
did.physloc: Film and Video: Thomas Boulevard, Room 225, Range 8/5-6 and Range 7/5-6 ; DVD: Thomas Boulevard, Room 225, Range 9/12/2

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: A finding aid was created to this collection by Joshua Beloff during the Spring 2011 semester as part of an undergraduate History internship in the archives.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: Digital reproductions of a very small percentage of the collection are available on DVDs located in the Archives Service Center.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Various playback devices are needed to watch the film and/or videos, which are available onsite at the Archives Service Center. Please make an appointment with the Media Curator before viewing. Although not displayed in the finding aid, data entered into Archivists' Toolkit can inform ASC staff about the material itself, such as length, type, condition, etc.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: All rights reserved. University of Pittsburgh.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: University of Pittsburgh Archives Moving Images, ca. 1928-2001, UA.Film.Video, University Archives, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Pittsburgh Archives Moving Images, ca. 1928-2001, UA.Film.Video, University Archives, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged into five series, then within sections that comprise Film and/or Video. The Sports series contains subseries alphabetized by sport name, then film and/or video sections.
Please note that the film/video within each section are not arranged in any particular order (e.g., chronological), but rather as they were found in each respective box.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of over 2,300 films and videos that mainly pertain to University of Pittsburgh athletics as well as University events and history. The collection (ca. 1928-ca. 2001) ranges from interviews and speeches by prominent University figures, such as Dr. Wesley Posvar and Tony Dorsett, to sports highlight videos and University institutional messages. It notably contains much footage of classic Pitt football games, including prominent bowl games. It also contains numerous videos and films which pertain to the city of Pittsburgh as well as miscellaneous topics that do not directly relate to the University of Pittsburgh. Types of media in this collection include VHS tapes, Betacam SP tapes, ¾ Inch U-matic tapes, and 16 millimeter film.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This series contains over 2,000 sports-related films and videos, including footage of games, practices, and interviews with prominent sports figures. Through this collection, one can view sports events (mainly football and basketball) from throughout the twentieth century, including a few football games from the 1930s.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subseries contains 20 videos, mostly from the 1990s, from the Pitt baseball program. This includes game and season highlights, notably including three tapes of footage from the 1995 NCAA baseball championship.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subseries of basketball-related videos includes subdivisions that denote whether the basketball videos pertain to either Men's or Women's basketball. There are 260 items altogether.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This section contains eight Men's basketball films from the early-to-middle part of the twentieth century. This notably includes one reel of footage from the 1941 NCAA Men's basketball championship.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This section contains much footage of the Pitt Men's team, mostly from the 1980s and 1990s. Numerous videos in this series can give viewers a chance to see the likes of Sean Miller, Charles Smith, and Ralph Willard. Altogether there are 194 videos.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This section contains two videos, each of which contains footage of both the Pitt Men's and Women's basketball teams. One video contains headshots from both teams, and the other video contains game footage from both teams.

did.unittitle: Pitt Basketball 1993-1994 Pitt Mens/Womens Basketball Headshots
Pitt vs. BG Men- December 1995 / Pitt vs. Penn State Women December 1995

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subseries contains over 1,600 film and videos of football footage, much of which pertains to the Pitt football program. There is much game footage of Pitt's offense and defense, respectively, from the 1990s, as well as much footage of bowl games, interviews with as well as profiles of prominent figures, such as Tony Dorsett and Mike Ditka, pregame shows, etc. This subseries also includes much footage from football games with rivals such as Penn State, West Virginia, and Syracuse.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This section contains nearly 1,000 football game films from 1931 through 1988. Many of these films break down Pitt's offense, defense, or kicking during a given component of the game (quarters, halves, etc.). This includes multiple bowl games.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subseries contains 17 videos of footage from the Pitt wrestling program, all of which are from the latter part of the 1990s. scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This section contains 58 films which reflect major historical events involving Pitt in the middle of the twentieth century. It notably includes footage of Nikita Khruschev at Pitt, as well as two interviews with Dr. Jonas Salk. This section contains footage from as early as 1928.
